title: Bestway BounceJam Kids Bouncer | Inflatable Mini Kids Bouncy Castle, 1.80 m x 86 cm
features: BOUNCEJAM KIDS BOUNCER: The BounceJam Bouncer is a safe and easy way for children to enjoy hours of active fun indoors and outdoors. The fun, bright stripes of colours on the base and sides are sure to be a hit with kids of all ages.

DURABLE AND SAFE: With a thick & sturdy inflatable base and inflatable sides that completely enclose the bouncer, your children can jump and play in the safety of the BounceJam walls. Max Capacity: 85kg

ENCOURAGES EXERCISE: The solid construction stands up to tons of bouncing, jumping, rolling, and tumbling, and actively encourages children to exercise. Kids will also learn spatial awareness, build muscles and gain strength as they jump and play.

GROSS MOTOR SKILLS: Two small openings, one on either side, make it easy for kids to get in and out. Kids will have a blast as they play all while developing motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and dexterity.

INDOORS OR OUTDOORS: Add this bounce house to your playroom or your back garden and make your child’s day a little more delightful and a lot more fun! Dimensions: 1.80 m x 86 cm (71 in. x 34 in.) For Ages 3+
